MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G4 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in West Princes Street.  In order to complete a repair on faulty electrical equipment in West Princes Street, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.30am on the 5th of November 2020.
